Global Namespace Inheritance Tree Inheritance Graph Name Index
File: vsip/tensor.hpp
  1/* Copyright (c) 2005 by CodeSourcery, LLC.  All rights reserved. */
  2
  3/** @file    tensor.hpp
  4    @author  Stefan Seefeld
  5    @date    2005-04-26
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: [view.tensor] views implementing
  7             three-dimensional tensors.
  8
  9    This file declares the \c const_Tensor and \c Tensor classes,
 10    which provide the generic View interface, and implement the
 11    mathematical idea of matrices, i.e. two-dimensional storage and
 12    access to values.  A \c const_Tensor view is not modifiable, but a
 13    \c Tensor view is modifiable.  */
 14
 15#ifndef VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
 16#define VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
 17
 18/***********************************************************************
 19  Included Files
 20***********************************************************************/
 21
 22#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 23#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 24#include <vsip/dense.hpp>
 25#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 26#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 27#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 28#include <vsip/core/subblock.hpp>
 29#include <vsip/core/refcount.hpp>
 30#include <vsip/core/view_traits.hpp>
 31#include <vsip/core/assign.hpp>
 32#include <vsip/core/lvalue_proxy.hpp>
 33#include <vsip/core/expr/evaluation.hpp>
 34
 35/***********************************************************************
 36  Declarations
 37***********************************************************************/
 38
 39namespace vsip
 40{
 41
 42enum whole_domain_type { whole_domain};
 43
 44/// View which appears as a three-dimensional, read-only tensor.
 45template <typename T, typename Block>
 46class const_Tensor : public impl::Non_assignable,
 47		     public  vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Tensor,Block>
 48{
 49  typedef vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Tensor,Block> impl_base_type;
 50  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
 51
 52public:
 53  // Compile-time values.
 54  static const dimension_type dim = 3;
 55  typedef Block                                      block_type;
 56  typedef typename block_type::value_type            value_type;
 57  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type reference_type;
 58  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
 59		const_reference_type;
 60
 61  typedef vsip::whole_domain_type whole_domain_type;
 62  static whole_domain_type const whole_domain = vsip::whole_domain;
 63
 64  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_const_view_type impl_const_view_type;
 65
 66  // [view.tensor.subview_types]
 67protected:
 68  typedef typename Block::map_type  impl_map_type;
 69  typedef impl::Subset_block<Block>  impl_subblock_type;
 70
 71public:
 72  typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type> subview_type;
 73  typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type> const_subview_type;
 74
 75  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
 76  struct transpose_view
 77  {
 78    typedef impl::Permuted_block<block_type, tuple<D0, D1, D2> >
 79      impl_transblock_type;
 80    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> type;
 81    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> const_type;
 82  }; 
 83
 84  // The following types are not (yet) part of the spec.
 85  template <dimension_type D>
 86  struct submatrix : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D < 3)>
 87  {
 88    typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, D> block;
 89    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_type;
 90    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_const_type;
 91
 92    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
 93    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> type;
 94    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> const_type;
 95  };
 96
 97  template <dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
 98  struct subvector : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D1 < D2 && D2 < 3)>
 99  {
100    typedef impl::Sliced2_block<block_type, D1, D2> block;
101    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_type;
102    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_const_type;
103
104    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
105    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> type;
106    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> const_type;
107  };
108
109public:
110
111  // [view.tensor.constructors]
112  const_Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k, T const& value,
113	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
114    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<3>(i, j, k), value, map), impl::noincrement)
115  {}
116  const_Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k,
117	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
118    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<3>(i, j, k), map), impl::noincrement)
119  {}
120  const_Tensor(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
121    : impl_base_type (&blk)
122  {}
123  const_Tensor(const_Tensor const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
124    : impl_base_type(&v.block())
125  { impl::expr::evaluate(this->block());}
126  ~const_Tensor() VSIP_NOTHROW
127  {}
128
129  // [view.tensor.transpose]
130  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
131  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type  
132  transpose() const VSIP_NOTHROW
133  {
134    typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::impl_transblock_type  block(
135      this->block());
136    return typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type(block);
137  }
138
139  // [view.tensor.valaccess]
140  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const VSIP_NOTHROW
141  {
142    assert(i < this->size(0));
143    assert(j < this->size(1));
144    assert(k < this->size(2));
145    return this->block().get(i, j, k);
146  }
147
148  // Supported for some, but not all, underlying Blocks.
149  const_reference_type operator()(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k)
150    const VSIP_NOTHROW
151  { impl_factory_type f(this->block()); return f.impl_ref(i, j, k); }
152
153  // [view.tensor.subviews]
154  const_subview_type get(Domain<3> const& dom)
155    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
156  {
157    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
158    return const_subview_type(block);
159  }
160
161  const_subview_type operator()(Domain<3> const& dom)
162    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
163  {
164    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
165    return const_subview_type(block);
166  }
167
168  typename subvector<1, 2>::const_type
169  operator()(Domain<1> const& d, index_type j, index_type k)
170    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
171  {
172    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
173    typename subvector<1, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
174    return typename subvector<1, 2>::const_type(sblock);
175  }
176  typename subvector<0, 2>::const_type
177  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d, index_type k)
178    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
179  {
180    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
181    typename subvector<0, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
182    return typename subvector<0, 2>::const_type(sblock);
183  }
184  typename subvector<0, 1>::const_type
185  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d)
186    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
187  {
188    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
189    typename subvector<0, 1>::subblock sblock(d, block);
190    return typename subvector<0, 1>::const_type(sblock);
191  }
192  typename submatrix<0>::const_type
193  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2)
194    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
195  {
196    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
197    typename submatrix<0>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
198    return typename submatrix<0>::const_type(sblock);
199  }
200  typename submatrix<1>::const_type
201  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d2)
202    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
203  {
204    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
205    typename submatrix<1>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
206    return typename submatrix<1>::const_type(sblock);
207  }
208  typename submatrix<2>::const_type
209  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2, index_type k)
210    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
211  {
212    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
213    typename submatrix<2>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
214    return typename submatrix<2>::const_type(sblock);
215  }
216
217  /// The following operators are an addition to the spec.
218  /// See https://support.codesourcery.com/VSIPLXX/issue26
219  typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_const_type
220  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, index_type k)
221    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
222  {
223    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
224    return typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_const_type(block);
225  }
226  typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_const_type
227  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
228    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
229  {
230    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
231    return typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_const_type(block);
232  }
233  typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_const_type
234  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
235    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
236  {
237    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
238    return typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_const_type(block);
239  }
240  typename submatrix<0>::impl_const_type
241  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type)
242    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
243  {
244    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
245    return typename submatrix<0>::const_type(block);
246  }
247  typename submatrix<1>::impl_const_type
248  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
249    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
250  {
251    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
252    return typename submatrix<1>::const_type(block);
253  }
254  typename submatrix<2>::impl_const_type
255  operator()(whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
256    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
257  {
258    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
259    return typename submatrix<2>::impl_const_type(block);
260  }
261
262};
263
264
265/// View which appears as a three-dimensional, modifiable tensor.  This
266/// inherits from const_Tensor, so only the members that const_Tensor
267/// does not carry, or that are different, need be specified.
268template <typename T, typename Block>
269class Tensor : public vsip::impl_View<vsip::Tensor, Block>
270{
271  typedef vsip::impl_View<vsip::Tensor, Block> impl_base_type;
272  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
273
274  // Implementation compile-time values.
275protected:
276  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
277
278  // [view.tensor.subview_types]
279  // Override subview_type and make it writable.
280  typedef impl::Subset_block<Block> impl_subblock_type;
281
282public:
283  typedef typename 
284    vsip::const_Tensor<T, Block>::whole_domain_type whole_domain_type;
285  typedef Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type>      subview_type;
286
287  // Compile-time values.
288  static const dimension_type dim = 3;
289  typedef Block                                       block_type;
290  typedef typename block_type::value_type             value_type;
291  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type  reference_type;
292  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
293		const_reference_type;
294
295  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
296  struct transpose_view
297  {
298    typedef impl::Permuted_block<block_type, tuple<D0, D1, D2> >
299      impl_transblock_type;
300    typedef       Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> type;
301    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> const_type;
302  }; 
303
304  template <dimension_type D>
305  struct submatrix : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D < 3)>
306  {
307    typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, D> block;
308    typedef Matrix<T, block> impl_type;
309    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_const_type;
310
311    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
312    typedef Matrix<T, subblock> type;
313    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> const_type;
314  };
315
316  template <dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
317  struct subvector : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D1 < D2 && D2 < 3)>
318  {
319    typedef impl::Sliced2_block<block_type, D1, D2> block;
320    typedef Vector<T, block> impl_type;
321    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_const_type;
322
323    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
324    typedef Vector<T, subblock> type;
325    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> const_type;
326  };
327
328public:
329
330  // [view.tensor.constructors]
331  Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k, const T& value,
332	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
333    : impl_base_type(i, j, k, value, map, impl::disambiguate)
334  {}
335  Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k,
336	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
337    : impl_base_type(i, j, k, map)
338  {}
339  Tensor(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(blk) {}
340  Tensor(Tensor const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(v.block())
341  { impl::expr::evaluate(this->block());}
342  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
343  Tensor(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
344    : impl_base_type (t.size(0), t.size(1), t.size(2), t.block().map())
345  { *this = t;}
346  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
347  Tensor(Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t)
348    : impl_base_type(t.size(0), t.size(1), t.size(2), t.block().map())
349  { *this = t;}
350  ~Tensor() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
351
352  // [view.tensor.transpose]
353  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
354  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type
355  transpose() const VSIP_NOTHROW
356  {
357    return impl_base_type::transpose();
358  }
359  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
360  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::type
361  transpose() VSIP_NOTHROW
362  {
363    typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::impl_transblock_type  block(
364      this->block());
365    return typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::type(block);
366  }
367
368  // [view.tensor.valaccess]
369  void put(index_type i,
370	   index_type j,
371	   index_type k,
372	   value_type val) const VSIP_NOTHROW
373  {
374    assert(i < this->size(0));
375    assert(j < this->size(1));
376    assert(k < this->size(2));
377    this->block().put(i, j, k, val);
378  }
379
380  reference_type operator()(index_type i,
381                            index_type j,
382                            index_type k) VSIP_NOTHROW
383  { impl_factory_type f(this->block()); return f.impl_ref(i, j, k); }
384
385  Tensor& operator=(Tensor const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
386  {
387    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
388	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
389	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
390    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
391    return *this;
392  }
393
394  Tensor& operator=(const_reference_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
395  {
396    for (index_type i=0; i<this->size(0); ++i)
397      for (index_type j=0; j<this->size(1); ++j)
398	for (index_type k=0; k<this->size(2); ++k)
399	  this->put(i, j, k, val);
400    return *this;
401  }
402  template <typename T0>
403  Tensor& operator=(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW
404  {
405    for (index_type i=0; i<this->size(0); ++i)
406      for (index_type j=0; j<this->size(1); ++j)
407	for (index_type k=0; k<this->size(2); ++k)
408	  this->put(i, j, k, val);
409    return *this;
410  }
411  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
412  Tensor& operator=(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
413  {
414    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
415	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
416	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
417    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
418    return *this;
419  }
420  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
421  Tensor& operator=(Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
422  {
423    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
424	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
425	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
426    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
427    return *this;
428  }
429  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
430  Tensor &operator=(impl::lazy_Tensor<T0, Block0> const &t) VSIP_NOTHROW
431  {
432    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
433	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
434	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
435    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
436    return *this;
437  }
438
439  // [view.tensor.subviews]
440  using impl_base_type::operator(); // Pull in all the const versions.
441  subview_type
442  operator()(const Domain<3>& dom) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
443  {
444    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
445    return subview_type(block);
446  }
447
448  typename subvector<1, 2>::type
449  operator()(Domain<1> const& d, index_type j, index_type k)
450    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
451  {
452    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
453    typename subvector<1, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
454    return typename subvector<1, 2>::type(sblock);
455  }
456  typename subvector<0, 2>::type
457  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d, index_type k)
458    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
459  {
460    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
461    typename subvector<0, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
462    return typename subvector<0, 2>::type(sblock);
463  }
464  typename subvector<0, 1>::type
465  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d)
466    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
467  {
468    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
469    typename subvector<0, 1>::subblock sblock(d, block);
470    return typename subvector<0, 1>::type(sblock);
471  }
472  typename submatrix<0>::type
473  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2)
474    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
475  {
476    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
477    typename submatrix<0>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
478    return typename submatrix<0>::type(sblock);
479  }
480  typename submatrix<1>::type
481  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d2)
482    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
483  {
484    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
485    typename submatrix<1>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
486    return typename submatrix<1>::type(sblock);
487  }
488  typename submatrix<2>::type
489  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2, index_type k)
490    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
491  {
492    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
493    typename submatrix<2>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
494    return typename submatrix<2>::type(sblock);
495  }
496
497  /// The following operators are an addition to the spec.
498  /// See https://support.codesourcery.com/VSIPLXX/issue26
499  typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_type
500  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, index_type k)
501    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
502  {
503    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
504    return typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_type(block);
505  }
506  typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_type
507  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
508    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
509  {
510    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
511    return typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_type(block);
512  }
513  typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_type
514  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
515    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
516  {
517    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
518    return typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_type(block);
519  }
520  typename submatrix<0>::impl_type
521  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type)
522    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
523  {
524    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
525    return typename submatrix<0>::impl_type(block);
526  }
527  typename submatrix<1>::impl_type
528  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
529    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
530  {
531    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
532    return typename submatrix<1>::impl_type(block);
533  }
534  typename submatrix<2>::impl_type
535  operator()(whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
536    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
537  {
538    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
539    return typename submatrix<2>::impl_type(block);
540  }
541
542#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op)				\
543  for (index_type i = 0; i < this->size(0); ++i)			\
544    for (index_type j = 0; j < this->size(1); ++j)			\
545      for (index_type k = 0; k < this->size(2); ++k)			\
546	this->put(i, j, k, this->get(i, j, k) op val)
547
548#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op)				\
549  assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) &&                                  \
550         this->size(1) == m.size(1) &&                                  \
551         this->size(2) == m.size(2));					\
552  for (index_type i = 0; i < this->size(0); ++i)			\
553    for (index_type j = 0; j < this->size(1); ++j)			\
554      for (index_type k = 0; k < this->size(2); ++k)			\
555	this->put(i, j, k, this->get(i, j, k) op m.get(i, j, k))
556  
557#define VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(asop, op)			   	   \
558  template <typename T0>                                           \
559  Tensor& operator asop(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW                \
560  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op); return *this;}               \
561  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
562  Tensor& operator asop(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
563  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op); return *this;}               \
564  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
565  Tensor& operator asop(const Tensor<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
566  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op); return *this;}
567
568  // [view.tensor.assign]
569  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(+=, +)
570  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(-=, -)
571  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(*=, *)
572  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(/=, /)
573  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(&=, &)
574  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(|=, |)
575  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(^=, ^)
576};
577
578#undef VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP
579#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR
580#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR
581
582namespace impl
583{
584
585template <typename T, typename Block>
586class lazy_Tensor : public const_Tensor<T, Block>
587{
588public:
589  lazy_Tensor(Block &b) VSIP_NOTHROW : const_Tensor<T, Block>(b) {}
590  // lazy copy: don't evaluate.
591  lazy_Tensor(lazy_Tensor const &t) : const_Tensor<T, Block>(t.block()) {}
592};
593
594} // namespace vsip::impl
595
596// [view.tensor.convert]
597template <typename T, typename Block>
598struct ViewConversion<Tensor, T, Block>
599{
600  typedef impl::lazy_Tensor<T, Block> lazy_view_type;
601  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_view_type;
602  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       view_type;
603};
604
605template <typename T, typename Block>
606struct ViewConversion<const_Tensor, T, Block>
607{
608  typedef impl::lazy_Tensor<T, Block> lazy_view_type;
609  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_view_type;
610  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       view_type;
611};
612
613template <typename T, typename Block>
614struct ViewConversion<impl::lazy_Tensor, T, Block>
615{
616  typedef impl::lazy_Tensor<T, Block> lazy_view_type;
617  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_view_type;
618  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       view_type;
619};
620
621
622namespace impl
623{
624
625template <typename T,
626	  typename Block>
627struct View_of_dim<3, T, Block>
628{
629  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       type;
630  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_type;
631};
632
633template <typename T, typename Block>
634struct Is_view_type<Tensor<T, Block> >
635{
636  typedef Tensor<T, Block> type; 
637  static bool const value = true;
638};
639
640template <typename T, typename Block>
641struct Is_view_type<const_Tensor<T, Block> >
642{
643  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> type; 
644  static bool const value = true;
645};
646
647template <typename T, typename Block>
648struct Is_view_type<impl::lazy_Tensor<T, Block> >
649{
650  typedef impl::lazy_Tensor<T, Block> type; 
651  static bool const value = true;
652};
653
654template <typename T, typename Block>
655struct Is_const_view_type<const_Tensor<T, Block> >
656{
657  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> type; 
658  static bool const value = true;
659};
660
661template <typename T, typename Block>
662T
663get(const_Tensor<T, Block> view, Index<3> const &i)
664{
665  return view.get(i[0], i[1], i[2]);
666}
667
668template <typename T, typename Block>
669void
670put(Tensor<T, Block> view, Index<3> const &i, T value)
671{
672  view.put(i[0], i[1], i[2], value);
673}
674
675/// Return the view extent as a domain.
676template <typename T,
677	  typename Block>
678inline Domain<3>
679view_domain(const_Tensor<T, Block> const& view)
680{
681  return Domain<3>(view.size(0), view.size(1), view.size(2));
682}
683
684/// Get the extent of a tensor view, as a Length.
685template <typename T,
686	  typename Block>
687inline Length<3>
688extent(const_Tensor<T, Block> v)
689{
690  return Length<3>(v.size(0), v.size(1), v.size(2));
691}
692
693} // namespace vsip::impl
694} // namespace vsip

696#endif // VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
